com.Leo.Game

类 BattleField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • com.Leo.Game.BattleField
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BattleField
extends java.awt.Frame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Battlefield interface class

    Graphical user interface, all the elements of the game can be used for the interface, the interface can accept the user's operation, with human-computer interaction. Users can choose to restart the game, quit the game, pause the game and find game help.

    The interface contains heroes, trees, rivers, barrier walls and "homes" that game users want to protect.

    从以下版本开始:
    2018.11.20
    版本:
    2.0
    作者:
    Leo
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Method of listening to menu items Determine if the mouse clicks on "new game", if so, pause the thread printable = false，Pop-up message box (OK or Cancel)， If you click OK, release the local screen resources this.dispose()，And start a new thread new BattleField() If you click Cancel, continue the thread printable = true Determine if the mouse clicks "pause", and if so, pause the thread printable = false Determine if the mouse clicks "Continue", and if so, continue the thread printable = true Determine if the mouse clicks "Exit", and if so, pause the thread printable = false，A pop-up message box ("Are you sure you want to quit the game?"
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Interface background drawing method
      void framPaint(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Game interface drawing method Heroes, rivers, trees, homes, walls, etc. are all called by the draw function in their respective classes.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void update(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Game interface dynamic update method Since the picture is still, and the picture requirements of our game are dynamic, the tanks and bullets in the game are constantly moving, and the ordinary wall that can be penetrated is also “moving”, so for the picture, it must be continuous.

    • 方法详细资料

      • update

        public void update(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Game interface dynamic update method

        Since the picture is still, and the picture requirements of our game are dynamic, the tanks and bullets in the game are constantly moving, and the ordinary wall that can be penetrated is also “moving”, so for the picture, it must be continuous. Update, redraw to produce dynamic effects.

        覆盖:
        update 在类中 java.awt.Container

      • framPaint

        public void framPaint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Game interface drawing method

        Heroes, rivers, trees, homes, walls, etc. are all called by the draw function in their respective classes.

        参数:
        g - Brush tool

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Interface background drawing method
        参数:
        g - Brush Tool

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Method of listening to menu items
        • Determine if the mouse clicks on "new game", if so, pause the thread printable = false，Pop-up message box (OK or Cancel)， If you click OK, release the local screen resources this.dispose()，And start a new thread new BattleField() If you click Cancel, continue the thread printable = true
        • Determine if the mouse clicks "pause", and if so, pause the thread printable = false
        • Determine if the mouse clicks "Continue", and if so, continue the thread printable = true
        • Determine if the mouse clicks "Exit", and if so, pause the thread printable = false，A pop-up message box ("Are you sure you want to quit the game?" OK or Cancel), If you click OK, exit the program System.exit(0) If you click Cancel, continue the thread printable = true
        • Determine if the mouse clicks "Help" - "Game Description", if so, pause the thread printable = false，Pop up the game description; If you click OK, continue the thread printable = true
        • Determine if the mouse clicks "game level", and if so, release the native screen resource this.dispose()，Change the game speed depending on the level of the game and Start a new thread new BattleField()
        指定者:
        actionPerformed 在接口中 java.awt.event.ActionListener
